feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 2:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: WNW 36 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 15.
